products.title: It's My Pleasure
products.body_html:
Some people like binge watching TV, others like junk food. What’s your guilty pleasure? Ours is, can you guess? Launching new stuff! Say hello to our newest palette, Ooh La La’s purple sis! We asked YOU what you wanted to see next, and purple was on your mind. Rich jewel tones, insane metallic finishes, create all the monochromatic looks. She’s sure to be your newest guilty pleasure. 

 Kittenfish: matte cool lavender 
Do or dough: metallic bright lavender with blue duo chrome flip 
Pretty cruel: matte berry mauve with gold flecks 
Bare minimum: metallic berry violet 
Earthshine: metallic pinky lavender with a blue duochrome flip 
Chick lit: metallic deep amethyst 
Mr. Sandman: icy rose with a silver sheen 	
Fan fiction: matte dusty pink 	
Sleeper: matte eggplant

products.title: Got the Hots
products.body_html: You like totally have a crush on all these shades. Pretty mauves for a day date, to rich pink and red for when you’re feeling a little spicy. Make these shades your essential for date nights.

products.title: In a Mood
products.body_html: When you’re mood is always nude. These three neutral shades make the perfect everyday trio.

products.title: Said & Done
products.body_html: You, you love it when you wear these one of a kind shades! Make a statement in bright pink, violet, and blackberry.

products.title: Blur Lux Lipstick Collection
products.body_html: Get all 16 shades of the new Velvet Blur Lux Lipstick. Your lip collection won’t be complete without it.

products.title: Blur Lux Lipstick Vault
products.body_html: The Vault is back featuring our newest Velvet Blur finish! Get all 16 shades, because we know you’ll be instantly obsessed. Go ahead, live LUX.

products.body_html: These bright, fun shades are too cute to handle! Bright orange and pinks create a bold look, or blot it out for a romantic touch.

products.title: Disney Designer Collection
products.body_html: #DisneyAndColourPop Ready for your close up? Get the Disney and ColourPop Collection. Includes: It's a Princess Thing Palette, all 6 Lux Lipsticks named after each Princess, all 6 Super Shock Shadows, all 3 Ultra Glossy Lips, and the 2 Super Shock Highlighters. You'll look red carpet ready in a snap! This item is limited edition. ©Disney

The boldest formula of our liquid lipsticks - in one smooth swipe, you’ll get intense color payoff that dries down to a super matte, transfer-proof finish. 
 This cool-toned burgundy has been running through our mind all day

ILUVSARAHII

products.title: Through My Eyes Palette
products.body_html: ILUVSARAHII You’re a sight to see, baby! Get endless looks with iluvsarahii’s first ever 16-pan shadow palette, includes 8 stunning metallics and 8 rich matte finishes. Get ahead of the curve with the trendiest shades, from rich emeralds to Pantone’s color of the year. Inspired by Karen’s unique perspective from her side of the beauty world, this palette was made for you to embrace and express your own individuality. Lucido: metallic light gold Wild Soul: matte dusty mustard yellow Mesmer-Eyez: metallic orange gold Sandalwood: matte soft light beige In a Wink: matte soft pastel peach Euphoric: matte bright true orange Canela: matte soft terracotta sprinkled with gold glitter Lomo: metallic bright coral red Emerald Dream: metallic vivid emerald green Muze: metallic bright warm gold sprinkled with silver glitter Divina: matte deep blackberry Flecks: metallic icy taupe packed with silver glitter Nostalgia: matte mid-tone warm rose Moody: matte rich forest green Nocturne: metallic rosy red Missbehave: matte rich wine red

products.title: Is This Real Life?
products.body_html: This one is for our OGs. This limited edition, exclusive Super Shock Shadow Vault is the ultimate gift for the ColourPop addict in your life, or (who are we kidding?) you! Features 25 brand new shades exclusive to the vault, including 5 new tie dye shadows , 5 never before made split-pan duos, and 10 never before made stamped shadows! Don't wait: extremely limited quantities, this baby's gonna go fast!

products.title: Black Cleansing Pad
products.body_html: This flexible, silicone cleansing pad uses tiny, yet effective bristles to gently exfoliate and get deep down into pores for the ultimate clean. Drop a dime-sized amount of AM to the PM onto pad, add water, and massage around face for an invigorating deep cleanse. Rinse with water.

products.title: Matcha
products.body_html: A creamy, lightweight moisture booster to refreshen tired skin. Formulated with Matcha Milk, Jojoba Milk, Rice Milk, White Tea, and Kale, this formula will quench your skin with antioxidants for a more energized complexion.

products.title: Fresh AF
products.body_html: Instantly combats tired, dehydrated skin. A refreshing blend of Tibetan Ginseng, White Lily, Rose Water, and Cucumber Water deliver a burst of hydration to revive and energize the complexion.

products.title: Rose
products.body_html: A silky drop of comfort to soothe irritated, unhappy skin. Formulated with Argan Milk, Rose Milk, Oat and Chamomile, this formula will nurture your complexion with soothing moisture.

products.title: Mellow Milk
products.body_html: Delivers refreshing relief from uncomfortable skin using a blend of White Tea, Calendula, and Marshmallow Root Extract. Chamomile and Oat Milk soothe irritation and reduce redness, leaving you with a cool, calm, collection complexion.

products.title: The Obsidian Set
products.body_html: The perfect set of accessories to complete your skincare routine in a chic colour that’ll never go out of style. The set includes the Black Obsidian Roller which is meant to cleanse and protect by drawing out stress and tension, and 3 matching accessories to keep your #shelfie on point.

products.title: Wide Awake
products.body_html: A trio curated to refresh and energize tired, dull skin.

products.title: The Ritual Bag
products.body_html: Our Fourth Ray holy grail essentials bundled up into a a chic clear clutch. Effortlessly cute, giftable, and travel-friendly ..it's almost too easy.

products.title: Watermelon Seed
products.body_html: Rich in antioxidants, Vitamin A, and Vitamin E, Watermelon Seed Oil combats free radical damage, balances sebum production, and provides detoxifying properties.

products.title: Soothe + Calm
products.body_html: Irritated, uncomfortable skin? This set will soothe your complexion leaving you with cool, calm, collected skin. Includes the Mellow Milk Mist, Rose Face Milk, and Rose Quartz Roller.

products.title: Energize + Refresh
products.body_html: Dull, tired skin? This refreshing set will give your complexion a boost of energy. The set includes the Fresh AF Mist, Matcha Face Milk, and Rose Quartz Roller.

products.title: The Extras
products.body_html: All of our favorite accessories and tools bundled up in a clear clutch! This is for the skincare lover that needs a little somethin' extra.

products.title: Blackout Bundle
products.body_html: Black never goes out of style and neither will this Blackout Bundle. In this sleek and stylish set, you have our basic essentials, go-to tools, and favorite accessories all in one of our favorite colors - black (duh). It's so good you''ll be trying to decide whether to buy one for your bestfriend or for yourself. We say both.

products.title: Superfruit
products.body_html: Feed your face! Superfruit is made from a blend of Avocado, Coconut, Red Raspberry, Dragon Fruit, and Chia Seed Oils - the ultimate antioxidant, vitamin, and omega-rich solution to healthy, nurtured skin.

products.title: Something Light
products.body_html: A refreshingly, hydrating duo curated to satisfy oily skin.

products.title: Skin Hero
products.body_html: This luxurious, nourishing oil is here to save the day (and your skin!). Skin Hero's blend of Argan, Baobab, and Strawberry Seed Oils work to replenish and protect your skin, leaving it soft and supple.

products.title: Marula
products.body_html: Rich in Vitamins C and E, Marula Oil is packed with antioxidants to combat free radical damage, nourish skin, and promote a more supple, youthful-looking complexion.

products.title: Keep It Calm
products.body_html: A trio curated to soothe and calm uncomfortable, irritated skin.

products.title: Jojoba
products.body_html: Rich in Vitamins E and B-Complex, Jojoba Oil conditions skin and balances sebum production.

products.title: In Too Deep
products.body_html: A deeply nourishing trio curated for the face oil lover!

products.title: Glow Up
products.body_html: Who doesn't love a good glow? Formulated with Maracuja, Prickly Pear, Jojoba, and Vitamin C, Glow Up is loaded with antioxidants and vimains for the ultimate radiant, lit-from-within complexion.

products.title: Black Scrunchies
products.body_html: A set of 3 black satin scrunchies to keep your hair out of the way during your skincare routine - a kink-free, cute accessory!

products.title: Black Obsidian Roller
products.body_html: You loved our Rose Quartz Roller so much that we knew we had to bring you guys something next level! This face roller is made from real black obsidian, which is known as a cleansing and protective stone that draws out stress and tension. A gentle massage with this roller will help cool and soothe puffiness, improve blood circulation, promote lymphatic drainage, improve skin elasticity, and relieve facial tension.

products.title: Argan
products.body_html: Rich in essential fatty acids and Vitamin E, Argan Oil intensely nourishes, conditions, and heals skin.

products.title: The Full Face Package
products.body_html: This set has everything you’d need for a flawless complexion. Use the Lightweight Hydrator to moisturize and prime, the No Filter Foundation Stick for buildable coverage and a natural skin-like finish, and the Flat Kabuki brush for seamless application.

products.title: Fair 27 N
Coco Loco
products.body_html: A gentle sugar lip scrub that exfoliates and conditions lips, pucker up! You’ll be going crazy for this clear scrub. Smells like a piña colada on the beach.

products.title: Razzle Dazzle
products.body_html: Treat yourself to the ultimate lip love kit! Our Lippie Scrub gently exfoliates for the softest, smoothest lips, while the Lippie Balm locks in moisture!

products.body_html:

Give ‘em the old hint of sheer bright purple balm. Smells like a pint of raspberry sorbet.

products.title: Passion Pit
products.body_html: Who can say no to soft, smooth, nourished lips? Packed with essential vitamins and moisturizing shea butter, the Lippie Balm instantly makes your lips kissably soft. Before you stop at makeout point, take this sheer red balm with you. Smells like a jar of passion fruit jam.

products.body_html: Who can say no to soft, smooth, nourished lips? Packed with essential vitamins and moisturizing shea butter, the Lippie Balm instantly makes your lips kissably soft. Cheers to you in this sheer peach balm. Smells like a bag of peach gummy candies.

products.title: Oui, Oui!
products.body_html: This Ultra Glossy Lip Bundle will have you saying ‘YES!’ Golden tones flatter every lip and a mix of pearlescent and prismatic finishes look great with any look.

products.title: Bisous, Bisous!
products.body_html: When your lips look this good… you’ll be dodging kisses all night! This Ultra Glossy Lip Bundle includes three gorgeous glosses in a mix of tinted, prismatic, and pearlescent finishes to fit any mood.

products.title: Crème de la Crème
products.body_html: You’ll be looking scrumptious in this 4-pan highlighter palette. A mix of warm and cool shades suit any skin tone, and you know we had to add the show stopping ultra violet! And the beauty of a palette? Mixing your faves to create your own custom shade. Good as Gâteau: warm ivory with a gold sheen One in a Millefeuille: soft rose with a gold flip Goody Two Choux: peach with an icy pink flip Pardon My Français: pale lavender

products.title: Sleepy Eyes
products.body_html: For that soft, diffused just-blotted look, our medium coverage liquid lipstick dries matte, doesn’t budge, and feels soft and comfy on the lips. You’ll wanna kiss this warm rosey nude with your eyes open.

products.title: Halo Effect
products.body_html: For that soft, diffused just-blotted look, our medium coverage liquid lipstick dries matte, doesn’t budge, and feels soft and comfy on the lips. This warm nude with a hint of coral will be everything you need and more.

products.title: Cookie
products.body_html: Get one swipe pigmentation in a full-coverage, matte finish in a super comfortable formula loaded with skin-loving ingredients like shea butter and Vitamin E. A matte warm brown nude- forever on the lips never on the hips!

products.title: Come Clean Cleansing Duo
products.body_html:
Two is better than one with the Come Clean Cleansing Duo.
Step 1: BFD Cleansing Oil to gently melt away sebum, makeup, water-proof mascara, sunscreen and pollution.
Step 2: AM to the PM Gel Cleanser to draw out impurities from your skin for an even deeper cleanse.

products.title: Cleansing Cloths
products.body_html: A set of 3 washable, reusable cleansing cloths - the perfect addition to any cleansing routine. These cleansing cloths gently exfoliate away dirt, makeup, and impurities leaving skin soft and ready to absorb the good stuff in your skin care products.

products.title: White Cat Headband
products.body_html: This cat ear headband keeps hairs under control while you cleanse, tone, hydrate and treat your skin!

products.title: Black Cat Headband
products.body_html: This cat ear headband keeps hairs under control while you cleanse, tone, hydrate and treat your skin!

products.title: Scrunchies
products.body_html: A set of 3 satin scrunchies to keep your hair out of the way during your skincare routine - a kink-free, cute accessory!

products.title: Later Hater
products.body_html: An overnight spot treatment formulated with soothing ingredients to help reduce breakouts. This two-phase pink solution targets spots with a highly effective blend of Salicylic Acid, Sulfur, and Calamine. Later Hater provides relief without leaving your skin itchy, flaky or irritated. Apply directly onto spots before bedtime to help dry up impurities while you sleep.

products.title: The Lightweight
products.body_html: Provides oil-free, refreshing hydration for healthy, balanced skin. The Lightweight is a fluid formula containing naturally derived Squalane. It absorbs quickly without the greasy residue, leaving skin soft, smooth, and makeup ready. Developed without dyes, harsh chemicals or fragrances that can cause irritation and breakouts.

products.title: Keep Clear
products.body_html: A concentrated, non-drying toner that clarifies and balances the skin. A blend of ingredients provide strong antioxidant and exfoliation properties resulting in a calm, clear complexion.

products.title: Rose Quartz Roller
products.body_html: Made from real rose quartz, this facial roller is an essential tool to any skincare routine. A gentle massage with this roller will help cool and soothe puffiness, improve blood circulation, promote lymphatic drainage, improve skin elasticity, and relieve facial tension. DO: Put me in the fridge or dip me in ice cold water before use! DON'T: Put me in the freezer- roller will become very fragile and can break.

products.title: AM to the PM
products.body_html: The ultimate daily face wash. Developed to gently and effectively dissolve and wash away dirt and makeup without over drying or stripping the skin of natural hydration. A complex of natural botanicals leave the skin clean, comfortable, and fresh.
